Question: Swarovski Optik CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Swarovski Optik

AX Visio

- World's first AI-supported binoculars
- Can recognize over 9,000 animal species
- Marc Newson-designed with 10x32 magnification and 32mm objective lens diameter
- Features 13MP and 1080p video camera, with wireless transfer to Swarovski Optik Outdoor app
- Built-in GPS and "Share discoveries" function
- Integrated operating and object-recognition system with Neural Processing Unit
- Offers real-time identification, image and video capture, and sharing functionality
- Priced at $4,799 and available from February 1, 2024
